mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productName, dirId, salePrice, supplier, brand, cutoff, costPrice) VALUES (#{productName}, #{dirId}, #{salePrice}, #{supplier}, #{brand}, #{cutoff}, #{costPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET productName=#{productName}, dirId=#{dirId}, salePrice=#{salePrice}, supplier=#{supplier}, brand=#{brand}, cutoff=#{cutoff}, costPrice=#{costPrice} WHERE id = #{id}
